players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Good morning everyone. A bit of a shocker to wake up to Diana being dead. I'm not sure what happened, but we need to figure out who did this. I'm just a villager, so I'm relying on all of you to..."
Bob: "I'm just a villager trying to make sense of this. Diana's death is a tragedy, and we need to work together to find the killer. I'll be observing everyone's behavior and statements carefully."
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote for him to protect the town."
You: "I support Charlie's claim. We should vote for Bob to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
